name: TweetDeck 2K16
description: Gives TweetDeck a modern look and feel, so hipster!
additional_info:
+ Wide Columns
+ Round Profile Pictures
+ Favorite Stars
+ Hiding old DMs

Using Styles from Pixeldesu
